What is ip2location
=====================

ip2location is a ip's location query tool

Data Providers:
  * `Taobao <http://ip.taobao.com/>`_

How to use it?
------------------

Install ip2locale:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install ip2location-python

Use ip2location:

.. code-block:: bash

    ip2location 8.8.8.8
